name: Deathless Zealot

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Str 13, Con 17, orc or half-orc, Deathless Initiate, Deathless Master, Diehard, Endurance, Ironhide**, base attack bonus +12.

sections.body: Whenever a creature rolls to confirm a critical hit against you, it must roll twice and take the lowest result.
sections.name: Benefits

description: Only the most serious wounds can stop you.
